== Lubuntu Screencast ==
Here you can find Screencasts regarding the Lubuntu Distribution based on Ubuntu.
Those videos give you a brief introduction to applications and interesting tips and tricks on the Lubuntu system. 
The Videos are mostly captured with [[http://recordmydesktop.sourceforge.net/about.php|recordmydesktop] or <nowiki>[[http://www.ffmpeg.org/|ffmpeg]]</nowiki> and hosted on <nowiki>[[http://blip.tv|blip.tv]]</nowiki> .

more will come ...
